title: Video: Mr. Meeble – Star Power
content:
Self-proclaimed “epic electronic glitch rock”, Mr.

Meeble’s music is a narcotic blend of 80’s disco and more experimental, prog styles. New video for single Star Power is a bizarrely yet beautifully crafted affair, coming across like something out of I-Robot blended with The Matrix. It may not be ground breaking nor set to storm the charts, but it’s wonderfully enjoyable and strangely addictive. Take a journey with Mr. Meeble below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
